html: (2 Nephi 18:21)."And they shall pass through it hardly bestead and hungry." "Israel would be taken into captivity because they would not hearken." (LDSKJ, Isaiah 8:21, footnote a.) A modern translation of this verse renders it as follows: "Distressed and hungry, they will roam through the land; when they are famished, they will become enraged and, looking upward, they will curse their king and their God." (New International Version of the Bible.)
